title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The Division of State Police is responsible for public safety
and security. When authorized by the Governor, the State Police may require
additional trained personnel on an immediate, but temporary basis to fulfill
its mission. This Part enables the superintendent, under such circumstances, and when so authorized, in his discretion, to temporarily reappoint recently
retired sworn members for a term of three months, which may be renewed in three
month increments, up to a maximum of two years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
469.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
